function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of safety measures in shared spaces and facilities for occupants could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases spreading.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures in shared spaces, such as regular disinfection, ventilation, and provision of hygiene resources.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, disinfection equipment, smart ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants of buildings with shared spaces and facilities.","Owner":"Building management or facilities management."},{"Description":"Inadequate control of air pollutants within and outside the building could lead to poor indoor air quality and potential health risks for occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory issues and other health problems among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control and reduce air pollutants, such as air purifying equipment, use of low VOC construction materials, and regular maintenance of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, air purifiers, low VOC construction materials.","People":"Occupants of buildings with indoor air quality concerns.","Owner":"Building management or facilities management."},{"Description":"Lack of coverage for water quality and wastewater management indicators may result in potential risks to public health and environmental contamination.","Impact":"Health risks related to waterborne diseases and environmental pollution due to inadequate water quality and wastewater management.","Mitigation":"Implement water quality testing, proper wastewater treatment, and adherence to water quality standards and regulations.","Technologies":"Water quality testing equipment, wastewater treatment systems, smart water monitoring systems.","People":"Local communities, building occupants relying on water sources.","Owner":"Local water authorities, building management."}]}
